## ðŸ“Œ PR Title Format

```
<type>: <brief description in imperative mood (max 50 chars)
```

**Types:** `feat`, `fix`, `docs`, `style`, `refactor`, `test`, `chore`

**Examples:**
- `feat: add user authentication`
- `fix: prevent null pointer exception`
- `docs: update API endpoint description`

## ðŸ’¡ Best Practices

- Keep descriptions under 400 characters (excluding code)
- For bugfixes: include reproduction steps
- For features: describe new behavior briefly
- Always test edge cases before requesting review
